## NgSelectComponent.\_appendPopupToBody() method

Appends popup component directly to body, allows absolute positioning over page body

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected _appendPopupToBody(component: Type<Popup>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  component | <code>Type&lt;Popup&gt;</code> | Popup component type to be appended |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
